data.comment: Today's referee, Rafael Traci, has blown to start the match.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 2, Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Flamengo.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Flamengo's half?
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Flamengo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Flamengo needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
Rafael Traci signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Flamengo's area.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Gerson (Flamengo) strikes at Estadio do Maracana but his header is cleared.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in Flamengo.
In the minute 9, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Rio de Janeiro.
Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Flamengo's half?
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Flamengo in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Goianiense GO's Gustavo Ferrareis breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Flamengo have a goal kick.
Rafael Traci awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 16, Rafael Traci signals a Flamengo throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 20, Rafael Traci awards the away team a throw-in.
Flamengo have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 21, Vitinho of Flamengo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Rafael Traci awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Flamengo's Thiago Maia is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 23, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Goal kick for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 25, Gustavo Ferrareis is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Goianiense GO's Gustavo Ferrareis looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 28, Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
Goianiense GO are coming forward and Janderson Santos de Souza gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Flamengo goal kick.
In the minute 30, Goianiense GO are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Flamengo.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 36, Bruno Henrique of Flamengo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Flamengo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Flamengo's half?
In the minute 41, Gustavo Henrique (Flamengo) gets booked by Rafael Traci, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 42, Goianiense GO's Ze Roberto misses with an attempt on goal.
Rafael Traci awards Flamengo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Rio de Janeiro.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Bruno Henrique puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Thiago Maia with an assist there.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Flamengo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Goianiense GO.
Flamengo make their first substitution with Natan replacing Gustavo Henrique.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO to take a throw-in in Flamengo territory.
In the minute 50, Goianiense GO's Gustavo Ferrareis is whistled for offside at Estadio do Maracana.
Flamengo drives forward and Gerson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Flamengo in their own half.
In the minute 53, Goianiense GO drive forward but Ze Roberto is judged offside.
Vitinho for Flamengo drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 55, Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Gabriel Barbosa of Flamengo is pulled up for offside.
Ze Roberto gets his shot on target but fails to score for Goianiense GO.
In the minute 59, Goal! The away team draw level at 1-1 through Ze Roberto.
That's a fine assist from Chico.
Michael is on a sub for Thiago Maia for Flamengo.
In the minute 62, Gustavo Ferrareis (Goianiense GO) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Throw-in for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, Rafael Traci awards the home team a throw-in.
Rafael Traci signals a Flamengo throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Flamengo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 68, In Rio de Janeiro, Gabriel Barbosa of Flamengo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Goianiense GO pushes forward through Marlon Freitas, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 68, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Flamengo.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Flamengo just outside Goianiense GO's area.
In the minute 70, At Estadio do Maracana, Gilvan has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo attack through Vitinho. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 73, The match at Estadio do Maracana has been interrupted briefly for a check on Gilvan, who is down injured.
In Rio de Janeiro Flamengo drive forward through Bruno Henrique. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 75, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Flamengo in their own half.
Juninho is replacing Marlon Freitas for the away team.
The home team replace Leo Pereira with Giorgian De Arrascaeta.
In the minute 76, Natanael is replacing Gustavo Ferrareis for the away team.
The away team replace Chico with Matheus Vargas.
Goianiense GOâ€™s Gilvan is on his feet again at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 77, Goianiense GO needs to be cautious. Flamengo have an attacking throw-in.
Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Flamengo are pushing forward but Matheus Franca's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in for Flamengo in the half of Goianiense GO.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
In the minute 79, In Rio de Janeiro, Willian Arao (Flamengo) misses the target with a header.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Juninho for Goianiense GO who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Can Flamengo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
In the minute 82, Flamengo make their fourth substitution with Lincoln replacing Gabriel Barbosa.
Free kick for Flamengo in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 83, Rafael Traci signals a throw-in for Flamengo, close to Goianiense GO's area.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marcelo Cabo (Goianiense GO) is making a fourth substitution, with Arnaldo replacing Janderson Santos de Souza.
In the minute 85, Rafael Traci signals a free kick to Flamengo.
Important block from the Goianiense GO defence as Giorgian De Arrascaeta fires in a strike for Flamengo.
Corner awarded to Flamengo.
In the minute 87, Gerson (Flamengo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Rafael Traci awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Throw-in for Flamengo at Estadio do Maracana.
Rafael Traci will wait an extra 7 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Goianiense GO's Juninho is back in action after a slight knock.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick Goianiense GO.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Giorgian De Arrascaeta of Flamengo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Flamengo have been awarded a corner by Rafael Traci.
Flamengo's Gerson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Goianiense GO defender.
Can Flamengo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Natan for Flamengo has been booked by Rafael Traci and receives a first yellow card.
Lucas Oliveira is on a sub for Ze Roberto for Goianiense GO.
